bioconda.name: bioconductor-seq2pathway
bioconda.summary: a novel tool for functional gene-set (or termed as pathway) analysis of next-generation sequencing data

biotools.summary: This functional gene-set tool for the analysis of NGS data consists of "seq2gene" and "gene2path" components. The seq2gene component links sequence-level measurements of genomic regions (including SNPs or point mutation coordinates) to gene-level scores, and the gene2path feature summarizes gene scores to pathway-scores for each sample.

bioschemas.name: seq2pathway
bioschemas.summary: This functional gene-set tool for the analysis of NGS data consists of "seq2gene" and "gene2path" components. The seq2gene component links sequence-level measurements of genomic regions (including SNPs or point mutation coordinates) to gene-level scores, and the gene2path feature summarizes gene scores to pathway-scores for each sample.
